website_summaries.verdict: Plenty of combs and options for a low-priced unit. If your skin can adapt to the unit, it is a real bargain.
pros: Don't let the low price fool you -- this one is suited for head, beard, and body grooming
Good battery, too, and you can shave wet or dry
cons: A bit harder on your skin than competing products

customer_reviews.title: Insanely hot blades, trimming not worth the burns..
customer_reviews.text: Received as advertised, though i don't know if I got a defective one or this may have happened to a lot of buyers but the stainless steel blades get so intensely hot after a minute of power that it's impossible to use it.. i tried to trim the mustache first then proceeded to the neck area but it left me dreadful red burning type rash due to the heat of the blades.. The body hair shaver seems to work correctly since it doesn't have the same exposed blades but uses another attachment instead.. Really disappointed about it since i thought switching to this brand would be quite positive..
customer_reviews.author: Johnny86

customer_reviews.title: Cracked trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product and had to make an exchange because there was a crack on the casing of product which I feel would make it no longer waterproof. Replacement arrived with the exact same crack. Must be an issue with the design/material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I received a replacement from Remington, (they are super nice people). After reading the reviews, I think I may have left it to charge too long? 3 hours not 3 days! I didn't know overcharging was still "a thing", with most electronics designed to stop charging when full; Either way set a timer for an hour maximum if you own this model just to be safe. The razor works well and the Remington folks could not have been nicer. I would buy another product from Remington.
customer_reviews.author: Brett K.

customer_reviews.title: Horribly made product.  Breaks in no time.
customer_reviews.text: This gives a great cut. I'm extremely disappointed in this in every other way. The first one I bought gave a great cut. When the battery died I plugged it in to charge. After a day I went to use it and it didn't turn on. I then noticed there were 2 cracks in the case. I figured my son had dropped it. I liked the close cut and decided to buy it again in Hope's that the first was a fluke. Well I plugged the new one in and when I picked it up to use the case is cracked in the same area as the first one. This is horribly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for the price of a haircut.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this recently most because my other shave did not meet all my grooming needs. I use this for hair and body trimming and sculpting. It has a number of adjustable attachments depending on how close you want to cut. So, if you're like me and like to cut or trim your own hair when it threatens to get unruly I think you will like the abilities of this particular shaver/grooming kit. Sometimes I like to shave the beard using the shears if I want to maintain a light stubble. It is gentle and does not cut into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: LPower Inkhorn NLP Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Ours won't charge anymore and it's 5 months old. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ours won't charge anymore and it's 5 months old. We babied it too so it's incredibly disappointing. Outside of the Amazon return window. UPDATE:::: Called Remington's customer service and this item has a TWO YEAR warranty! They're sending me a brand new one, no questions asked!!!! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Alix J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 'landscaping'
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we purchased these for - trimming down below in the shower. My only complaints - no stand for charging. and no LED to indicate when it is on. I suppose that most of the time you could hear when it is on, but a simple LED would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good attachments and battery life let down by poor material quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the waterproof blue trimmer. After normal use, it vibrated itself apart by developing a crack in the plastic case at the connection point for the different attachments. This was within the first month of owning it and only using it weekly, never dropping it. The crack went just below where the o-ring is that seals the case and inner electronics from water, so a very slow and gradual leak happened. Water got in and corroded the tactile switch, preventing it from ever turning on again. Trimmer lasted from August to January. Otherwise a phenomenal trimmer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made; Ordered 3 and all are cracked in the same two spots
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 for my brother, his roommate, and myself on prime day because they seemed good for the price, but we all failed to notice each of them were cracked in the same two spots right underneath the removable shaver attachment when we got them (you can see the cracks running vertical on each side of the front of the shavers in the picture). Worked fine for the one or two times I got to use it before the battery became ruined from water seeping into the cracks, which is when I took a closer look at mine and the others and noticed we all have the same defect. Guess you get what you pay for, obviously cheaply manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: will eat your face
customer_reviews.text: The only good things about this trimmer are that it's waterproof and rechargeable (and has a good battery life). Other than that, not a huge fan. It does its job but not without eating your face first. The blades get ridiculously hot and will cut you/catch your hairs regardless of how good you're keeping it. TLDR: probably don't trust the trimmer near any sensitive bits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until plastic broke
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this trimmer. It had all the attachments I needed and did a good job shaving in the shower. Then one day putting an attachment on, the plastic housing broke. Since then I have tried to keep it dry because it clearly wasn't waterproof anymore... didn't matter because now it's not working anymore. The power button doesn't do anything. Very disappointed in the build quality, despite it being an otherwise good product. Looking at other reviews here, it seems I am not the only one with this issue. Some more thickness in the plastic at this location would probably go a long way. Unfortunately I can not recommend,end this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this groomer/trimmer exactly two(2) years ago and it just died this week after two(2) years of heavy usage underwater/in the shower (full body once a week & head maintenance at least 1-2 times a week). It trims so close that I don't even shave my bald head anymore. As soon as it died I immediately ordered another one without hesitation. It's a no brainer for the price, when you do the math it's less than $0.25 a week for a very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Leon

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BUY FROM AMAZON SHIPPED BY AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I like this shaver, I purchased it to replace my older model. But also like many other people in the reviews I received a cracked one.... I called amazon and they offered to send me a new one if I returned this one, but I needed to shave..... however i declined and just added some blue duct tape I had lol. It works properly and time will tell how it holds up. More powerful than the previous model and longer lasting battery also.
customer_reviews.author: dreams

customer_reviews.title: Solid shaver
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is one of the better ones I have used. I got this a while ago now and I still use it. It feels very sturdy in your hand. The battery lasts a long time without needing a charge. I would possibly purchase this product again (although I am apt to always trying new products). I would certainly recommend it if someone asked about shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Durable and consistent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of the Remington bodygroomers. My last one decided the button would not turn it off after 10 years of use. In the end I feel I got my money's worth out of the last one. I even kept the head attachments from the last one and I am using them with this one until they dull. Has worked well for me for many years. Works best if your clean the hair from under the guard that tends to get stuck as you go along.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It’s like shaving with a piece of broken glass.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wet/dry shaver I could use in the shower and decided to give this a shot... I regret my decision. At first it worked extremely well, then all of a sudden it started to pull the hairs on my face and cutting my skin. I routinely oiled the blades and rinsed the cutter head after each use. I’ve tried everything get it to stop to no avail. I hate this shaver and I’m sure you will too.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good for use only without beard trimmer attachment (guard)
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it was waterproof and I like to shave and groom in the shower. It had the attachment for trimming hair and beard to different lengths. It is relatively effective (not great) for shaving my head without the attachment but the minute I try to groom my beard with he attachment beard hair quickly (within one stroke) clogs the shaver and limits its effectiveness. Even after cleaning (after every stroke) the razor does not trim uniformly to the setting (3 & 4 are the worst). This is only good as a cheap alternative for head shaving because of its waterproofing. I don't recommend it if you're trying to get it to fulfill all of its advertised capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Graves

customer_reviews.title: Overall like it, do suffer the occasional nick from more curved sections though
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good battery life for my case (using it for maybe 20 minutes every 2 days, it will slowly lose it's punch after 2 weeks but keep kicking for another 2 or so), overall easy to use for most surfaces. Have had mild trouble with cleaning it as the head doesn't fully come apart (I think) which means it's a little worn in, but it hasn't stopped functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Segler

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: Did not even last 3 monthsnof careful use and charging. One day no longer was able to turn off unless I plugged it into the charger, and then after a couple of days of that it no longer turned on. The previous trimmer was bought for $15 at a store and lasted for over 3 years of nearly daily use. Also, a proprietary charger is bulky and inconvenient. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Micehaus

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple uses.. then one time it never turned off.. ran till the battery died.. its great if you like to fall asleep with the sound of an electric shaver in the background..
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG DURHAM

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, sensible, easy-to-use trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice groomer kit. I like that it's simple to use, and the attachments go on and off easily. I use the standard clipper blade for my head, and the body attachment for below-the-neck parts.The rubberized housing is very comfortable. Motor is strong, battery is long-lasting, and blades are sharp (at least at the outset; we'll see how they hold up after a year). I bought this to replace a Wahl with a lithium battery, and that one started to peter out after less than a year's use. Plus, the Remington is easier to use. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Costero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grooming tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it to "shave" my head while in the shower. My last one lasted about 4 years before the battery stopped taking a charge. The blades stayed sharp and it's plenty strong for any grooming needs. The added attachments aren't of use to me so I can't comment on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Berfield

customer_reviews.title: Could have been, should be better.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a great product. It worked really well. I only used this shaver twice and only a few minutes each time. I've had it about 30 days and it will not charge now. I'm going to take advantage of their 60 day money back guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Not really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer worked ok for about 7 months and then one day the power button quit working and wouldn't shut off. I took it apart to see what the deal was and everything inside was damp and corroded. I used this in the shower, never submerged it, so if purchasing for the waterproof aspect I would not recommend it. I added pictures of what the motor/battery/circuit board inside looked like disassembled.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good but not actually water proof long term
customer_reviews.text: Good razor, but not actually waterproof. I have kept in the shower because that is where I use it, but after about a year both times, it turns on but won’t turn off. I have had it replaced twice under the warranty by Remington. “ our quality team determined that the cause of failure of your original unit was water intrusion. However, the PG6250 is supposed to be 100% waterproof. But I would recommend that you be careful with the new unit being around too much water.” So as a whole it is a well priced razor backed by a great company warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Shea

customer_reviews.title: 3 months until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 months, then the power button started sticking or something. Now at 4 months I can turn on the trimmer, but then it won't turn off with the power switch and I just have to let it run the battery out before it turns off. Not ideal. Stuck with a 1 star review as I could only return it after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carson

customer_reviews.title: 2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months later it wont charge. Had intermittent problems within 2 months but now the thing is a brick.
customer_reviews.author: MartyP

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't trim every day, the clippers have performed flawlessly. I rarely have to charge as the charge lasts a good while. The attachment change is a bit clumsy and relies on plastic spring tension to stay clipped. I wonder how long the attachments will flex and hold to the clipper, a positive is I have never had one come off during use. Blades seem very good and never tug or pull hairs. charging hookup could be better, as it interferes with the hanging hole. Overall, I would buy this again with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Dynarider

customer_reviews.title: when buying an item it works.
customer_reviews.text: a waste of a piece of plastic. would not work. defective out of package. probably cost more to make package than the shaver, if you want to call it that. should not be on market.
customer_reviews.author: hubert harrell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect first trimmer. I am a woman with an undercut but otherwise long hair and (luckily for me) no where else I need to use this and it's simple to use, works great, is waterproof, and I haven't charged it yet even though I use it every other week for three months.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in August of 2017 and took good care of it cleaning and oiling regularly and was used primarily as dry clippers. It died the first of March 2018. It was working one second and then it would not power on or charge. Would not recommmed.
customer_reviews.author: Cari J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shower use
customer_reviews.text: I only use this in the shower or for very short hair trims. I've had it for 2 years now and it has never overheated and stays charged for weeks before needing to be plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 or 5 stars depending on how important the waterproof aspect is to you
customer_reviews.text: One of the best personal trimmers I've used. I dropped a star off because while it's technically waterproof I found that the motor gets bogged down under wet conditions and doesn't perform optimally. That said, I'd rather have a trimmer that's better than all the others in this price bucket at everything else under dry conditions, so if you don't ever plan to use it in a shower, consider this a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Telperion

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Just after 3 months of use it stopped working! No support after 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Kvan4

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It’s awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one at Walmart just like this YEARS ago but I lose the power cord. I bought it again because I love it. I can use it whilst showering and it won’t rust or loose sharpness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trims well, blazing hot
customer_reviews.text: The blades work really well at trimming facial hair, however about about 1-2 minutes of use, the blades get ridiculously hot and actually started to cut my neck. I had an old model that wasn't waterproof that worked phenomenal and never had an issue. Note: I've only had this approximately 2.5 weeks and have had the issue since day 1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy....
customer_reviews.text: Gives a great trim. As long as it lasts. Purchased and received June 25. No longer works September 5. Battery won't charge, common issue with this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.T.

customer_reviews.title: The power button malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: At some point in time rest assured that the power button will malfunction. It will either turn on and you won't be able to turn it off or you simply wont be able to turn it on. I've purchased this item twice because I figured the first time maybe it was just a one off situation but sure enough the second time it happened again just the same as it did the first time. If you get 10 sessions out of it, consider yourself lucky. STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to shaver and trimmer. Long battery time, easy to clean and a good value. I use it on my head, sideburns and general guy stuff trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.  I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shaver, easy to use, easy to clean, holds a charge for a long time. Have used it about 10 times and it hasn't needed to be recharged yet. Have used it in the shower (wet) and on dry skin. Probably works better when dry. It does a good job and isn't a razor smooth shave, but it close.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Works but arrived fractured. Is no longer water proof. I saw a number of reviews saying that people's trimmers had arrived chipped, figured I'd take a risk, mine arrived with a broken housing too. Must be a bad manufacturing issue.
customer_reviews.author: GamesOgre

customer_reviews.title: One year
customer_reviews.text: I never used this in the shower, only rinsed in sink after using. Used it in the showe for the first time last week and that was the last time it would turn on. Lasted less than a year. Was nice while it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A+ Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing almost two years ago now, still running like a champ. Lost a few of the attachments, but didn't really use them anyways. Great little product.
customer_reviews.author: nicoliavic

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after seeing good reviews. However, this item gets real hot after a few minutes of usage, and becomes quite inconvenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constantly dying
customer_reviews.text: Charging is completely screwed. Maybe you can get one arm done before the battery starts dying. So if you like walking around with half-hair and half-trimmed this trimmer is for you. Otherwise, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a Christmas present for my son and he loves it. He like that he can use it in the shower and I don't think he's had to recharge it yet (now February 9th). It's a great little groomer!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Huckaby

customer_reviews.title: Used a few times and stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer worked great till it stopped working. Used it maybe 6 time in the shower. Bought the WetTech because I like to shave while I’m in the shower and always rinsed, dried and pluged in so it ready for next use. Grabbed it the other day accidentally hit the power button and it turned on then wouldn’t turn off untill I hit the button several times then never would turn back on. RIP trimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and Pretty good razor
customer_reviews.text: The razor is definitely water proof, my only issue is that the body shaving attachment isn't that great, it doesn't really do a good job at shaving. the other attachments are good though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kaveh

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't cut my beard with attachments on. I have a thick beard but still expected more than just pulling on my beard. Never tried the waterproof abilities or battery life; had to send it back for something that works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A.

customer_reviews.title: Body Cracked After Short Period
customer_reviews.text: The body cracked after about 2 weeks. No idea where the crack came from (never dropped it), but it has not affected performance. Regardless of the crack, it still works great
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin I. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Solid while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: While the trimmer lasted, it worked fine. As long as you know how to shave, you won't have any issues. But I barely owned it for 6 months and the plastic body cracked. Not very durable, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: CynicalCzech

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived cracked but still works. Ordered as a replacement for my husband since we couldn't find it in store. He won't use any other trimmer. A little bummed that it is cracked but still works the same. We lost his old one when we moved so we needed the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: m &ldquo;gg

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality after less then three weeks does not charge anymore and leave scratches on your face have to be really careful spend a couple of extra cash and get a better model
customer_reviews.author: jorge  estevez

customer_reviews.title: Main razor head cuts you
customer_reviews.text: The total package is solid, and the compliment of differing length heads works well. However, the main razor head, used for cleaning up your sideburns or your neck, has cut my neck repeatedly. I'm thinking that there is a defect in the razor itself, but I began using it after the return date so am unable to request a return. Be cautious and double-check the blades!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Foley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is light and smaller than a standard trimmer, definitely more for body hair. It's been working great in the shower so far no issues. Nice and sharp when I first opened it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Spacek

customer_reviews.title: Nice buzzer, no stand
customer_reviews.text: Cuts clean and nice, haven't had it tug on my hair at all when shaving. The waterproofing is nice, very handy to be able to shave in the shower. The only complaint I have is that there isn't really a charging stand, so it looks a little ugly when it's charging.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: These trim well. I was hoping that the cutting ...
customer_reviews.text: These trim well. I was hoping that the cutting blade would have been closer to the norelco one for sensitive areas, though it isn’t. Other than that, they work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Best personal shaver ever..read more
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver ever lol. This will not replace clippers or a trimmer, but comes close to it..i have thick hair and get razor bumps if shaved improperly. Used it everywhere with the multiple attachments and use light soap or cream when shaving face or sensitive areas ..why because you can wash it with water. Take a shower before you groom & it will stay clean forever.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worst electric razor you will ever see. Do not buy. I read many reviews before purchasing. Some good, some bad. I figured it couldn’t be that bad so let’s give it a try. You will have the worst shave experience. It will scratch and cut you like your wife attacked your neck. I regret buying. Will look for other options.
customer_reviews.author: Texasace246

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The unit works better than my 350 dollar self cleaning shaver I'm impressed. the base developed a crack in it after 3 months but I called Remington and they took care of it no hassle. I am very pleased with the product and the service would recommend
customer_reviews.author: scott potvin

customer_reviews.title: It cuts pretty efficiently and precisely
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about 6 months and I have to say it is a really solid little trimmer. It holds plenty of charge and can be used for a dozen beard trimmings without plugging it in. It cuts pretty efficiently and precisely. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Voss

customer_reviews.title: One star off because the charger is dumb
customer_reviews.text: First shaver I've had that hasn't rusted, very powerful and feels high quality. One star off because the charger is dumb
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this trimmer for me Christmas of 2017. I charged it for the 24 hours it calls for and put it in the shower. I use it 2 or 3 times a week. The next time I had to charge it was July. It is now Jan 2019 and I have only charged it those 2 times. It is going strong. Maybe the last trimmer I ever have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: works great for shaving your face
customer_reviews.text: works great for shaving your face. Can use it for all kinds of cuts. In the shower it is great as well, just a bit harder to get everything in a clean swip like when shaving with a razor.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Did not last develops a stress crack in plastic
customer_reviews.text: Just like a reviewer posted below, this will develop a crack at the top lettinng water in and shortly after will be dead. the whole assembly slides in the top with a couple o rings tight fit causing stress on the outer plastic developing the crack. can't post a pic as I already tore it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Alex734

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. It works great in the shower. its waterproof and the price is unbeatable
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The body groomer head is miserable
customer_reviews.text: This this is miserable. At the, the body groomer part is. The angle of the head and lack of skin guard on the groomer means that it will cut you pretty easily. I had a Phillips body groomer before and after 4 years it finally died. I bought this and regret it every time I use it. Even if you go really slow and make sure you don't cut yourself, the teeth from the groomer will still find a way to cut you. Avoid this at all costs
customer_reviews.author: Caleb S

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS FOR YOUR HEAD
customer_reviews.text: It says it's for your head in the description but the actual product doesn't say head and it is not for your head at all. Its a beard and body only.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Van Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed attachments, good battery life and a very user-friendly product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: EOS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, good cut I use it on shower the rechargeable battery “asts a while
customer_reviews.author: Dawnn

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product, just received a defective one.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this review 4-5 stars, the razor itself does an amazing job with getting the hair off. Mine has an issue however that it will be fully charged and will not turn on and if it turns on then it will not be able to turn off. I'll write it off as a defect with only my product, but it's mildly annoying as I can not use the product when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: This work great
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I use it in the shower with no issues and it hols the charge great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all — will leave you bloody
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be left with bleeding cuts where ever you use this, go ahead and buy it. I used it for the first time to trim my facial hair, and wound up with cuts and abrasions under my jaw from the cutting portion. Horrible. If there is a trick to these, I don't know it.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Time Use Only?
customer_reviews.text: This seemed okay for the one time I was able to use it, but it wouldn't charge after its initial use. Assuming it charged okay I would have rated 4 or 5 given the low cost, but even things this cheap should work more than once...I guess I bought a disposable clipper set?!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Plastic shaver that has weak attachments
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy. For the price it is what it is
customer_reviews.author: Hambone S

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: The cutting blade gets so hot that it's impossible to use for more than a short time, even when it's well lubricated. It doesn't cut well and nicks if you aren't really careful.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one! The first one I had for 3 years! Great product.

product_meta.title: Remington PG6250 WetTech Lithium Powered Head, Beard, & Body Grooming Kit, Trimmer (8 Pieces)
product_meta.description: The Remington PG6250 WETech Head, Beard, and Body Grooming Kit offers a versatile and complete grooming experience. The WETech design gives you the freedom to trim dry or wet, in the shower, or even with shaving gel—whatever is most comfortable. The full-size trimmer comes with 5 comb attachments to give you length options. And the advanced, multi-stage cutting system of the body hair groomer attachment captures hairs of all length with ease. Don’t forget about the Lithium Power battery, which delivers 70 minutes of cordless runtime with each full charge. Plus, this grooming kit is backed by a 60-day money back guarantee.
